mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.trusts_id AS "trusts", a.content AS "content", a.title AS "title", a.status AS "status", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", u2.name AS "user.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.id = a.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO my_message( id, user_id, trusts_id, content, title, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{user.id}, #{trusts}, #{content}, #{title}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE my_message SET user_id = #{user.id}, trusts_id = #{trusts}, content = #{content}, title = #{title}, status = #{status}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
